params.name: database_fixed_field_perms
params.comment: Contains a JSON object of fixed field permissions.

params.name: category_fields
params.comment: JSON object of permitted form fields to show.

params.name: field_display_commentform
params.comment: Determines if this field should show and be editable on the comment reply form.

params.name: database_page_id
params.comment: Page ID this database is used on (if any)

params.name: page_js_css_ids
params.comment: JSON array storing CSS and JS template IDs for inclusion on this page.

params.name: template_file_object
params.comment: The URL for the file object that corresponds with this item.
